articles.description: The second round of stimulus payments are set to go out. Here are five common red flags that experts say could signal a stimulus check scam.
articles.content:
Americans lost over $211 million to Covid-19 scams and stimulus payment fraud, according to the Federal Trade Commission. Since January, the agency has received over 275,600 complaints. 
While fraud… [+6741 chars]
